extendedInfo.description: Manage your First Bankcard account anytime, from anywhere!With your firstbankcard.com user ID and password you can:â¢ Check account balance â¢ View transaction history â¢ Pay your credit card bill â¢ Signup to receive alertsItâs Secure â Your security is always our top priority. First Bankcard Mobile uses the same security that you use to access your account online.Itâs Simple â Our user interface is easy to use and understand. Your account information fits your deviceâs screen and is easy to read and work with.Itâs Free â First Bankcard Mobile banking is available at no cost to you. Your mobile carrierâs message and data rates may apply.Download First Bankcard Mobile today! *First Bankcard Mobile application will work with Android 2.2 or higher.

reviews.title: Works as advertised.
reviews.comment: Functional app that launched and ran smoothly on my Atrix 2. View transactions, make payments, view scheduled/recent payments all work.  Could use more features like statement download, the ability to see what the next minimum payment is, due date, and would love the ability to see/use rewards points.  Overall, I recommend to use if you have one of their cards and use online banking with them already.
reviews.author: Michael Legato

reviews.title: Horrible........
reviews.comment: Quite possibly the worst banking/credit card app out there. A monkey could have designed a better app than this. If you want to view your balance,  it\'s great,  but it all goes downhill quick, like ferrari quick,  after that.
reviews.author: Jared Jollensten

reviews.title: Broken app
reviews.comment: Never launches, you get a black screen or visual noise on launch. They shouldn\'t advertise this on their website as it is completely useless at this point. I cant wait until they get the bugs fixed on this as I could really use this app
reviews.author: Mike Wheeler

reviews.title: Simple but effective...
reviews.comment: It\'s nothing to write home about, but what do you expect from a simple account access application?  You can view recent transactions and even make payments to your card from accounts you\'ve stored online.    It does what it advertises, and it gets the job done.  Works fine on my Galaxy SIII.
reviews.author: Nathan Boyd

reviews.title: About time
reviews.comment: Firstbank is so ridiculously backwards & behind the times. Their app reflects that. Still, at least they finally HAVE one. It\342\200\231s not THAT terrible, it\342\200\231s just not nearly as good as any other app in the field.
reviews.author: Ethan Miguel Scott

reviews.title: Terrible app
reviews.comment: Slow and not easy to use. You can\'t do much with this app. Needs work
reviews.author: West Berumen

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Galaxy S2
reviews.comment: Comes up with either a blank screen or a page full of visual noise.
reviews.author: rhudspeth

reviews.comment: Galaxy SII.   Will check to see if it runs on my Jellybean tablet

reviews.comment: Like someone else said, nothing but a black screen. Please update this app!

reviews.title: Ok app
reviews.comment: This app gives you the basic Info on your account

reviews.title: Serves its purpose
reviews.comment: Does what you need it to do. Nothing fancy, just simple.
